mapper.sql: `bid_id` AS `id`, `bid_date` AS `date`, `file_name` AS `fileName`, `vendor_id` AS `vendor`, `vendor_program` AS `program`, `currency`, `exchange_rate` AS `exchangeRate`

SELECT `b`.`bid_id` AS `id`, `b`.`bid_date` AS `date`, `b`.`exchange_rate` AS `exchangeRate`, JSON_OBJECT( 'id', v.`vendor_id`, 'name', v.`vendor_name`, 'code', v.`vendor_code` ) AS `vendor`, `b`.`currency` as `currencyCode`, JSON_OBJECT( 'id', `w`.`won_id`, 'number', `w`.`won_number`, 'date', `w`.`won_date`, 'amount', `w`.`amount`, 'virtualWarehouse', `w`.`stage` ) AS `won` FROM `hkpsi_bid` AS `b` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_vendor` AS `v` ON `b`.`vendor_id` = `v`.`vendor_id` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_won_bid` AS `w` ON `b`.`bid_id` = `w`.`bid_id`
mapper.select: SELECT `bid_id` AS `id`, `file_name` AS `fileName`, `bid_date` AS `date`, JSON_OBJECT( 'id', v.`vendor_id`, 'name', v.`vendor_name`, 'code', v.`vendor_code` ) vendor, `currency`, `exchange_rate` as `exchangeRate` FROM `hkpsi_bid` AS `b` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_vendor` AS `v` ON `b`.`vendor_id` = `v`.`vendor_id` WHERE `bid_id` = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT `b`.`bid_id` AS `id`, `b`.`bid_date` AS `date`, `b`.`exchange_rate` AS `exchangeRate`, JSON_OBJECT( 'id', v.`vendor_id`, 'name', v.`vendor_name`, 'code', v.`vendor_code` ) AS `vendor`, `b`.`currency` as `currencyCode`, JSON_OBJECT( 'id', `w`.`won_id`, 'number', `w`.`won_number`, 'date', `w`.`won_date`, 'amount', `w`.`amount`, 'virtualWarehouse', `w`.`stage`, 'isArrival', har.arrival_order_number, 'isShipped', hl.logistics_id, 'isPayment', pay_date ) AS `won` FROM `hkpsi_bid` AS `b` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_vendor` AS `v` ON `b`.`vendor_id` = `v`.`vendor_id` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_won_bid` AS `w` ON `b`.`bid_id` = `w`.`bid_id` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_arrival_record` har ON arrival_order_number = won_number LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_logistics` hl ON w.won_number = hl.won_number LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_payment_record` epr on w.won_number = epr.won_number WHERE `b`.`bid_id` = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT};

SELECT `bid_id` AS `id`, `file_name` AS `fileName`, `bid_date` AS `date`, JSON_OBJECT('id', v.`vendor_id`, 'name', v.`vendor_name`, 'code', v.`vendor_code`) vendor, `currency` FROM `hkpsi_bid` AS `b` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_vendor` AS `v` ON `b`.`vendor_id` = `v`.`vendor_id` ORDER BY `b`.`created_at` DESC;

SELECT `b`.`bid_id` AS `id`, `b`.`bid_date` AS `bidDate`, `v`.`vendor_name` AS `vendor`, `vp`.`program_name` AS `program`, `b`.`file_name` AS `fileName`, `b`.`currency` AS `currency`, `b`.`exchange_rate` AS `exchangeRate`, `wb`.`won_number` AS `wonNumber`, `wb`.`won_date` AS `wonDate`, `wb`.`amount` AS `amount` FROM `hkpsi_bid` AS `b` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_won_bid` AS `wb` ON `wb`.`bid_id` = `b`.`bid_id` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_vendor` AS `v` ON `v`.`vendor_id` = `b`.`vendor_id` LEFT JOIN `hkpsi_vendor_program` `vp` ON `b`.`vendor_program` = `vp`.`program_id`
AND `b`.`bid_id` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, '%')
AND `b`.`bid_date` between DATE_FORMAT(#{bidDateStart}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{bidDateEnd}, '%Y%m%d')
AND `v`.`vendor_name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND `wb`.`won_number` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wonNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND `wb`.`won_date` between DATE_FORMAT(#{wonDateStart}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{wonDateEnd}, '%Y%m%d')
AND `wb`.`amount` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, '%')
ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
select bid_date from hkpsi_bid eb left join hkpsi_won_bid ewb on eb.bid_id = ewb.bid_id where eb.bid_id = #{bidId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM hkpsi_bid WHERE created_at >= #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY created_at DESC limit 1
SELECT currency_symbol FROM `hkpsi_exchange_rate` LEFT JOIN hkpsi_bid eb ON eb.exchange_rate = hkpsi_exchange_rate.exchange_rate WHERE bid_id = #{bidId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
